      Creates a new player, initializing attributes with default initial values
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      isLorenzo - true if this player represents "Lorenzo il Magnifico" (the player controlled by the server in single player mode)
      Returns:
      the PlayerDashboard of the new player

      public java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> getFourLeaders​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
